thread.title: Seth Meyers Mocks Michael Flynn With World's Shortest Highlight Reel
thread.title_full: Seth Meyers Mocks Michael Flynn With World's Shortest Highlight Reel

author: Lee Moran
title: Seth Meyers Mocks Michael Flynn With World's Shortest Highlight Reel

organizations.name: reel seth meyers mocks michael flynn with world

text: Seth Meyers Mocks Michael Flynn With World's Shortest Highlight Reel Blink and you'll miss it. 02/15/2017 03:05 am ET Lee Moran Trends Editor, The Huffington Post Seth Meyers looked back at former national security adviser Michael Flynn’s most memorable moments on the job Tuesday. And it didn’t take long. After playing the briefest of highlight reels, the “ Late Night ” host imagined how Flynn wrote his resignation letter on Monday amid allegations that he discussed the U.S. sanctions against Russia with its ambassador in the weeks before President Donald Trump took office. “Twenty-four days, I use disposable razors for longer than that,” said Meyers. “He didn’t even last as long as a David Blaine stunt .” Check out the full segment above.
